NeedDef.label: vegetables
NeedDef.description: Satisfaction in the vegetable food group. If this drops too low, the person's mood will decrease, but if all of the food groups are kept high, their mood will increase.

NeedDef.description: Satisfaction in the fruit food group. If this drops too low, the person's mood will decrease, but if all of the food groups are kept high, their mood will increase.
